description: A &3Blast Furnace&r is a specialized furnace variant that &dsmelts ores at double speed&r.
&3Hoppers&r can automatically &dtake items from&r or &dinsert items into&r into any blocks with an inventory - including &3Furnaces&r and &3Chests&r.
Any furnace can have a hopper above it, inserting into the &3material slot&r, a hopper beside it, inserting into the &3fuel slot&r, and a hopper below it, extracting from the &3result slot&r.
By adding chests to each, this can be used to &dsmelt many stacks of items&r without checking in.
&7[Fabrication]&r &6Clicking&r the &3output slot&r of a furnace set up this way will transfer you any experience generated.
